data.message: Em polo from def jam told me to get at u n paul because you sign lyrical artist www.soundcloud.com/mastahmynd 90's bars

replies.message:
Lol yea right... FV, Eminem, Strange, or any label would never sign this guy... lol. Anyone spamming major artists Facebook comments is not on any level of good. Anyone who does what he's doing to get signed or get promo obviously is still a rookie in the rap game. Anyone with any ounce of skill or talent knows to just let his music attract labels and the right people. 

Stop spamming your shitty music everywhere and instead, spend that time learning how to mix and master / produce better. How to write better and how to record better....
John Corsner  dont let the internet gas u up chump ill slap fire out ya cheeks u got the wrong dude maybe u should check credentials u fuckin herb
I think your music was dope...keep grinding
